name: Prayer Supporter
author: Garon Griffiths and Alexey Isaev

sections.description: This WordPress plugin allows you to have a prayer request system on your blog.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the whole prayer-supporter directory into your WordPress plugins directory.

  2. Activate the plugin on your WordPress plugins page

  3. Edit or create a page on your blog which includes the text {RESERVATION2} and visit
    the page you have edited or created. You should see your reservation in action.
    Or try three other interfaces {RESERVATION}, {RESERVATION3}, {RESERVATION4}

  4. Edit email_function.php with the required information.

  5. Schedule “nightly.bat” to run on the server daily. If you don’t have the ability to do this, visit http://www.griffshp.com
    to be set up with a wordpress site and the ability make this plugin work.

Uninstalling:

  1. Deactivate the plugin on the plugins page of your blog dashboard

  2. Delete the uploaded files for the plugin

  3. Remove the text {RESERVATION} from the page you were using to show reservation, or delete that page
sections.changelog:

0.1.3

  • Bug fix

0.1.2

  • Created password change page. Still not functional, awaiting forum reply to fix

0.1

  • Inital alpha release

short_description: Prayer Supporter - A plugin for your Wordpress site to allow people to sign up for frequent emails from you.
description: This WordPress plugin allows you to have a prayer request system on your blog.

upgrade_notice.0.1: Before upgrade make a backup of DB.
